mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_created_at, is_popup) VALUES (#{userId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeCreatedAt}, #{isPopup})

INSERT INTO notice_attachment (attachment_id, notice_id, notice_file_url, notice_file_type, notice_sort_order, notice_file_created_at) VALUES (#{attachmentId}, #{noticeId}, #{noticeFileUrl}, #{noticeFileType}, #{noticeSortOrder}, #{noticeFileCreatedAt})
INSERT INTO notice_popup (notice_id, popup_start, popup_end, popup_image_url, popup_summary) VALUES (#{noticeId}, #{popupStart}, #{popupEnd}, #{popupImageUrl}, #{popupSummary})
